channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- YouTrack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- YouTrack

item.title: CVE-2022-28650|2024-08-03T05:56:16.394Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43700 it was possible to inject JavaScript into Markdown in the YouTrack Classic UI

item.title: CVE-2022-28649|2024-08-03T05:56:16.466Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43563 it was possible to include an iframe from a third-party domain in the issue description

item.title: CVE-2022-28648|2024-08-03T05:56:16.455Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43563 HTML code from the issue description was being rendered

item.title: CVE-2024-35299|2024-08-02T03:07:47.059Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.29548 the SMTPS protocol communication lacked proper certificate hostname validation

item.title: CVE-2024-38504|2024-06-18T13:43:29.800Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 the Guest User Account was enabled for attaching files to articles

item.title: CVE-2024-38505|2024-06-18T13:48:20.789Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 user access token was sent to the third-party site

item.title: CVE-2024-38506|2024-06-18T13:23:38.289Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 user without appropriate permissions could enable the auto-attach option for workflows

item.title: CVE-2024-28229|2024-03-07T11:39:59.851Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 user without appropriate permissions could restore issues and articles

item.title: CVE-2024-28228|2024-03-07T11:39:59.443Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 creation comments on behalf of an arbitrary user in HelpDesk was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-28230|2024-06-04T18:03:09.904Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 attaching/detaching workflow to a project was possible without project admin permissions

item.title: CVE-2024-35299|2024-06-04T17:34:32.608Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.29548 the SMTPS protocol communication lacked proper certificate hostname validation

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 user without appropriate permissions could enable the auto-attach option for workflows

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 user access token was sent to the third-party site

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 the Guest User Account was enabled for attaching files to articles
